input.name: AssetOpsBench-datasets
input.description: AssetOpsBench is a unified framework and environment designed to guide the development, orchestration, and evaluation of domain-specific agents for task automation in industrial asset operations and maintenance. The release of the benchmark focuses on scenarios commonly posed by domain experts—such as maintenance engineers, reliability specialists, and facility planners. We devloped 4 individual domain-specific agents and 2 multi-agent orchestration frameworks to create a simulated industrial environment enabling end-to-end benchmarking of multi-agent workflows in asset operations.

distribution.name: AssetOpsBench-alert-rule-meter-mapping-files
distribution.description: CSV-format mapping between alert rules and meters

distribution.name: AssetOpsBench-alert-rule-failure-code-files
distribution.description: CSV-format failure code mappings for alert rules

distribution.name: AssetOpsBench-anomaly-to-failure-mapping-files
distribution.description: CSV-format mapping between anomalies and failure codes

distribution.name: AssetOpsBench-collection-component-files
distribution.description: CSV-format AssetOpsBench collection to component mapping files

distribution.name: AssetOpsBench-primary-failure-codes-files
distribution.description: CSV-format AssetOpsBench primary failure codes file

field.name: id
field.description: id of utterance

field.description: the domain type of utterance, e.g. IoT, FMSR.

field.name: category
field.description: the category of the query, e.g. Knowledge Query, Tuning Query.

field.name: text
field.description: the task description of the utterance

field.name: characteristic_form
field.description: the characteristics of the expected output

input.name: Chiller_6_June_2020_Sensor_Data
input.description: Sensor data collected from Chiller 6 during June 2020, including temperature, flow, and efficiency metrics.
input.citation: IBM AssetOpsBench, Chiller 6 June 2020 Sensor Data, available from https://raw.githubusercontent.com/IBM/AssetOpsBench/refs/heads/main/src/assetopsbench/sample_data/chiller6_june2020_sensordata_couchdb.json
